contents: I am a Photographer and Music lover from Switzerland. Here you will see a lot of Photos form beautiful Nature. Everything I create is made 100% by myself.
title: About me

contents: I fell in Love with this kind of Photography. It opens so many new opportunities and in my Opinion it’s really beautiful.
title: Light on the road

contents: This Lake is beside the village I live and is always beautiful to visit. Now I wanted to capture it by Night, which seemed like the perfect evening for this. The Clouds and the Atmosphere in general were great for a “BULB” Exposure (Exposure over 30 seconds) and also to watch with my own eyes.
title: Bulb

contents: The rainy weather gives this Photo the special Atmosphere
title: Waterfall

contents: Magical Atmosphere with Starlight and moving Cars
title: Magical lights
